name: Honest Abe
intro:
A man of principle who has never told a lie in his life.

Abe is so honest it's almost comical. He once returned a dropped coin to a thief who had just robbed him. His reputation for honesty is so strong that even the sheriff feels guilty inspecting his goods.
appearance: A middle-aged man with an earnest face, wearing simple but well-maintained clothes. He carries a small sack of goods and meets everyone's eyes directly.
